meanings.definition: to go back on a promise or commitment
meanings.sent1: She renegues on her promise to help with the project.
meanings.sent2: He always renegues on his plans at the last minute.
meanings.sent3: The cat renegues on its decision to chase the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun renegues on its commitment to shine every day.
meanings.sent5: The student renegues on studying for the test, hoping for luck instead.

meanings.definition: a person who deserts or betrays a cause or organization
meanings.sent1: The renegues caused chaos within the group.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled a renegues after leaving the team abruptly.
meanings.sent3: The renegues sneaked away from the meeting, avoiding responsibility.
meanings.sent4: The renegues is like a lone wolf, wandering without loyalty.
meanings.sent5: Becoming a renegues can lead to isolation and mistrust from others.
